- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:

channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
rust_compiler:
- rust
target_platform:
- linux-64

name: pendulum

about.description:
Drop-in replacement for the standard datetime class.
It behaves exactly like it but with many improvements.

Drop-in replacement for the standard datetime class.
It behaves exactly like it but with many improvements.

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: pendulum
  version: 3.2.0

package:
  name: pendulum
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/pendulum-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e80feda2d10fa3ff8b1526715f7d33dcb7e08494b3088f2c8a3ac92d4a4331ce
  patches:
    - 0001-remove-tzdata-dep-for-pip-check.patch

build:
  number: 2

requirements:
  build:
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - maturin >=1.0,<2.0
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
    - ${{ compiler('rust') }}
    - cargo-bundle-licenses
  host:
    - python
    - maturin >=1.0,<2.0
    - poetry-core
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - python-dateutil >=2.6
    - tzdata >=2020.1
    # from test extra
    - time-machine >=2.6.0,<3.0.0

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - pendulum
      pip_check: true
  - script:
      - python -c "from pendulum._pendulum import parse_iso8601"
      - python -c "from pendulum._helpers import days_in_year"

about:
  license: MIT
  license_file:
    - THIRDPARTY.yml
    - LICENSE
  summary: Python datetimes made easy
  description: |
    Drop-in replacement for the standard datetime class.
    It behaves exactly like it but with many improvements.
  homepage: https://pendulum.eustace.io
  repository: https://github.com/sdispater/pendulum
  documentation: https://pendulum.eustace.io/docs/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ocefpaf
    - xylar

about.description:
Drop-in replacement for the standard datetime class.
It behaves exactly like it but with many improvements.
